name: Tailornova/Couturme
headline: AI for Instantly Manufacturable Fashion
description: PatternFast helps fashion companies and brands design and launch new collections in minutes instead of months. We save brands 90% of the time and 95% of the costs associated with the tedious, time-consuming, and complex process of garment design and development. Our AI software enables the instant design of over hundred billion of unique styles, complete with production-ready documentation, patterns, and automated sizing.

founders.name: Yuliya Raquel, Founder/CEO
founders.description:
I am the Co-Founder and CEO at PatternFast (Tailornova), fashion AI that enables custom apparel design at scale. I spent thirty years in the fashion industry and founded a DTC brand, generating $43M in sales. 
My mission is for the fashion industry to become sustainable. We automate design w/3D and AI.
I am 4-time award-winning designer. I dressed celebrities such as the Oscar winner, Gabourey Sidibe, Ashley Fink, Jill Scott, Kacee Stroh, Frenchi Davis and others.

raw_markdown='![Patternfast](http://patternfast.com/img/logo.be3d7407.png)![Patternfast](http://patternfast.com/img/logo-color.36aadc3c.png)
Join Waitlist
![](http://patternfast.com/img/hero.4c3dd515.jpg)
Create collections in minutes, not months
# AI for Instantly Manufacturable Apparel Design and Development
Join Waitlist[Launch YCFEATURED ON](http://patternfast.com/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/launches/LrB-patternfast-ai-for-instantly-manufacturable-fashion>)
Whether you are a large fashion brand or an Indie designer, our platform lets you create 100+ billion of customizable, digital production-ready MTM and standard sized blocks in a few clicks. 
Compatibility with your tools from:
### Optitex
### Browzwear
### Tukatech
### Alvanon
### CLO3D
### and many others...
Why PatternFast
## Adapts to any collection,big or small
![](http://patternfast.com/img/why1.6a2b8d6d.jpg)
### Accurate fit
Ensure fit precision in every pattern block with smart adjustments, shrinkage and compression. The fit of our blocks was tested on 350k people.
![](http://patternfast.com/img/why2.8de9881a.jpg)
### Fast pattern block generation
Bring your collections to life faster with PatternFast's rapid instantly manufacturable design ideation.
![](http://patternfast.com/img/why3.10f5f2e6.jpg)
### Bespoke solutions
From mass production to custom designs, PatternFast is capable to create unique solutions for large enterprise companies.
Features
## Accelerate your workflow
#### Get production-ready quickly
### Smart pattern adjustments, automatic grading and instant tech packs
  * No longer a time-consuming process.
  * Automated grading to your brand's fit charts or to our provided standard fit charts.
  * Generate tech packs automatically with all necessary specifications, measurements, and design details, just add your ISOs.


![](http://patternfast.com/img/feature1.e3258e3f.png)
#### Eco-friendly approach
### Sustainability in fashion
Our precision in digital product creation ensures that your patterns fit and are ready for production, minimizing valuable resources, such as time, paper, fabric waste and contributing to more sustainable fashion practices. 
![](http://patternfast.com/img/feature2.126e6bec.png)
#### Unleash your creativity
### Endless design possibilities
  * Click and design to instantly experiment with different silhouettes, style lines, lengths, fabrics and details, all while ensuring that your patterns are consistently accurate and production-ready.
  * Unlock your new creative fashion potential without the usual technical constraints and quickly release new products.


![](http://patternfast.com/img/feature3.e0520da3.png)
PatternFast's Fashion 3.0 Advanced Proprietary Technology
## Limitless, Instantly Manufacturable Design Possibilities
![](http://patternfast.com/img/technology.67ab3dc9.jpg)
![](http://patternfast.com)
#### AI-powered designer
Explore new creative directions with designs tailored to your style.
![](http://patternfast.com)
#### Collaborative team features
Share designs, collaborate in real-time, and streamline your entire workflow, all in one place.
![](http://patternfast.com)
#### Customizable fit charts
Ensure your designs fit perfectly across all sizes, from bespoke MTM garments to mass production.
Solution
## Perfect for every professional in the fashion Industry
#### # 01
### Manufacturers
Streamline production with instant pattern drafting, grading and automated tech packs.
#### # 02
### Fashion Brands
From custom pieces to full collections, go to market quickly with creativity and speed.
#### # 03
### Apparel Merchandisers
Easily plan and create collections with silhouettes, colorways and printways.
#### # 04
### Clothing Boutiques
Sell exclusive designs, unique to your brand without having a team of designers and product developers.
#### # 05
### Fashion Schools
Prepare students for the future with cutting-edge tools for merchandising, pattern design and grading.
#### # 06
### Indie Designers
Bring your creative vision to life with professional-grade tools that don't require a large team.
Case studies
## What our customers say
![](http://patternfast.com/img/igigi.b6b1d4ed.jpg)
### “PatternFast made it possible...
Transitioning to a sustainable, made-to-order model was a big step for IGIGI. PatternFast made it possible by providing customized configurators and a seamless MTM order management system. Their support has been invaluable in our journey. 
![](http://patternfast.com/img/igigi-logo.582ff02d.png)
![](http://patternfast.com/img/couturme.7425d1c0.jpg)
### “PatternFast revolutionized our bespoke bridal ...
... and evening wear process with a smart, AI powered design system that scales custom gowns based on size, style, and budget. It's been a game-changer for COUTURME." 
![](http://patternfast.com/img/couturme-logo.efcdfe07.png)
![](http://patternfast.com/img/cta.cb951cf2.jpg)
### Join our waitlist
## You'll see it in action
Be ready to transform your design process?
Join Waitlist
![Patternfast](http://patternfast.com/img/logo.be3d7407.png)
## From idea to reality, seamlessly
[Privacy](http://patternfast.com/</privacy-policy>)[Terms and Conditions](http://patternfast.com/</terms-and-conditions>)
Join Waitlist[Launch YCFEATURED ON](http://patternfast.com/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/launches/LrB-patternfast-ai-for-instantly-manufacturable-fashion>)
We're here to helpinfo@patternfast.com
© 2024 by PatternFast

generated_description:
**Tailornova/Couturme: AI Redefining Fashion Design**

Founded in 2024 and hailing from San Mateo, California, Tailornova (originally known as PatternFast) is on a mission to revolutionize the fashion industry with AI-driven solutions that make garment design faster, cheaper, and more accessible. As a proud participant in Y Combinator’s Batch W19, Tailornova is not just another startup; it’s a transformative force for both large fashion brands and indie designers.

### The Problem They're Solving

Traditionally, designing and developing a new clothing collection is a sluggish, complex endeavor—taking months and incurring high costs. Tailornova changes that dynamic dramatically, claiming to save brands up to 90% of the time and 95% of costs associated with garment design. Their software is capable of creating over 100 billion unique styles at the click of a button, complete with automated patterns, sizing, and production-ready documentation.

### Unique Offerings

1. **Speed and Efficiency**: The platform allows designers to generate production-ready patterns and tech packs rapidly. Tailornova's AI not only enhances speed but ensures fit precision through smart adjustments, having been tested on a database of 350,000 individuals.

2. **Sustainability**: By streamlining the design process and minimizing waste—both in materials and time—Tailornova contributes to more sustainable practices within the fashion industry.

3. **Customization Galore**: Whether it's mass production or custom orders, Tailornova’s solution adjusts to any collection size, making it suitable for manufacturers, brands, boutiques, and even fashion schools to prepare students for future challenges.

### Who Can Benefit?

The beauty of Tailornova's platform lies in its diverse applications. Manufacturers can use the software for instant pattern drafting, while fashion brands can quickly launch complete collections. Apparel merchants can effortlessly plan their offerings, and indie designers can bring their personal visions to life without needing a massive team.

### A Nod from Users

Testimonials from brands like IGIGI and COUTURME highlight Tailornova's transformative impact. IGIGI credits the software with facilitating their transition to a sustainable made-to-order model, while COUTURME praises its AI-powered design system for revolutionizing bespoke bridal wear.

### Conclusion

In summary, Tailornova/Couturme represents a paradigm shift in fashion design, combining cutting-edge AI technology with an adaptive, user-friendly platform. For anyone in the fashion industry looking to bridge the gap between creativity and efficiency, this company offers a compelling solution.

To see the magic for yourself, check out their website at [PatternFast](http://patternfast.com) and join the waitlist. Who knows—this could be the next step in your fashion journey!
